title: USB-A adapter adds instant Wi-Fi 6E support to Windows 11 PCs
description: $90 adapter makes Wi-Fi 6E adoption slightly easier.

title: After pushing AV1 codec, Google goes after Dolby with HDR and audio standards
description: AV1's Alliance for Open Media wants more royalty-free standards.

title: Artist receives first known US copyright registration for generative AI art
description: Registration of AI-assisted comic comes amid fierce online debate about AI art ethics.

title: Hackathon finds dozens of Ukrainian refugees trafficked online
description: Europol also identified dozens of online users suspected of exploiting refugees.

title: Hunga Tonga eruption put over 50B kilograms of water into the stratosphere
description: New study shows eruption plume circled the globe multiple times in the stratosphere.

title: Tesla issues recall for 1.1 million EVs due to power window problem
description: A closing window could pinch someone thanks to problems with the reversal action.

title: Lawsuits say Meta evaded Apple privacy settings to spy on millions of users
description: A former Google engineer reported the risk, but Meta found no privacy concern.

title: Florida to Supreme Court: Let us regulate social networks as common carriers
description: Florida law was blocked by lower courts that found it violates First Amendment.

title: Is Moore’s law actually dead this time? Nvidia seems to think so
description: Chips "going... down in price is a story of the past," CEO says.

title: AI model from OpenAI automatically recognizes speech and translates it to English
description: "Whisper" open source model may become a building block in future speech-to-text apps.

title: The new Chromecast is official: It’s $30, runs Google TV, and has a remote
description: The remote and dongle look identical to the 4K version.

title: Mario + Rabbids: Sparks of Hope is a more dynamic take on tactical RPGs
description: Preview: Gaming worlds collide in this oddly charming and confident action-RPG sequel.

title: Microsoft plans October 12 event to address its very out-of-date Surface lineup
description: There's not a single Surface model with a current-gen processor in it.

title: The pathway to 90% clean electricity is mostly clear. The last 10%, not so much
description: Six different approaches—with pros and cons—for getting to a 100% carbon-free grid.

title: New tech can make your house a solar microgrid
description: New version of support hardware can keep homes solar powered during outages.
